RegisterSuccessMessage1: We have sent you an email to validate your email address. Please follow the procedures in the mail.
RegisterSuccessMessage2: You can now login using the your credentials.
ChangeEmailSuccessMessage: We have sent you an email to validate your email address. Please follow the procedures in the mail.
ChangePasswordSuccessMessage: You can now login with your new password.
ResetPasswordSuccessMessage1: We have sent an email to the given email address.
ResetPasswordSuccessMessage2: Please follow the procedure in the email to continue.
levels:
A higher access level implies all lower levels.

Level 100: The right to view the map.
Level 200: The right to access aggregated data of a map.
Level 300: The right to view geoMessages.
Level 400: The right to add geoMessages.
Level 500: The right to add polygons.
Level 600: The right to delete geoMessages.
Level 700: The right to alter or delete polygons.
Level 800: The right to alter polygon layers.
Level 900: The right to add users to user groups up till degree 900.
Level 1000: The right to make content public and to create or alter user groups.
